attributes.action:
To run a by-election in south Cambs 
As Heidi Allen has left the Conservatives
attributes.additional_details: Due to Heidi Allen leaving the Conservative party to join another group who has a different mandate we feel a by election needs to be run to give the population the choice of candidate for south cambs
attributes.background: Heidi Allen has left the Conservative party therefore she has no mandate and needs to be replaced or voted in again
